author: CT Phipps
description:
Lies of P by Neowiz, Round8 Studios, and Rough is a Souls-like game in the vein (no pun intended) of Bloodborne. The premise is an odd one that immediately caught my attention: what if Pinocchio was a steampunk dark fantasy? It’s such an out-there premise that I didn’t initially check the game out, which proved […]

The post REVIEW: Lies of P appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Lies of P
